note.p: Dressmaker and Sunday School teacher. Of Down, Kent. In 1871, was head of a household consisting of her three younger brothers, Albert, Mark, and George, and her sister Elizabeth.
Census returns of England and Wales 1871 (The National Archives: Public Record Office RG10/875/36/5)
Correspondence vol. 16, letter from J. B. Innes, 18 June [1868]
Correspondence vol. 17, letter to J. B. Innes, 18 October 1869
